title: Request Copy of a Cashed Check
description: A customer needs a copy of a specific check that has already been cashed for their records.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and gather the check details (number, date, amount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the necessary information to locate the check image.

tasks.description: Retrieve the front and back images of the cashed check from the archive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds and retrieves the check images.

tasks.description: Provide the check images to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the images to the customer's secure message center.
